description: The QRF segment is used with the QRD segment to refine the content of a query further

fields.name: Where Subject Filter
fields.description: identifies the department, system, or subsystem to which the query pertains.  This field may repeat as in LAB~HEMO, etc

fields.name: When Data Start Date / Time
fields.description: data representing dates and times equal or after this value should be included

fields.name: When Data End Date / Time
fields.description: data representing dates and times the same as or before this date should be included

fields.name: What User Qualifier
fields.description: an identifier to further define characteristics of the data of interest

fields.name: Other Qry Subject Filter
fields.description: a filter defined locally for use between two systems.  This filter uses codes and field definitions which have specific meaning only to the applications and/or site involved

fields.name: Which Date / Time Qualifier
fields.description: specifies type of date referred to in QRF-2-when data start date/time and QRF-3-when data end date/time

fields.name: Which Date / Time Status Qualifier
fields.description: specifies status type of objects selected in date range defined by QRF-2-when data start date/time and QRF-3-when data end date/time).

fields.name: Date / Time Selection Qualifier
fields.description: allows specification of certain types of values within the date/time range.
